title: Client Sound
body: Don't get me wrong. Client sound is amazing{{champion:37}} . i just prefer to listen to my pre game jams to hype me up before games. So i mute the client. But every patch whether its a minor or major one the client will unmute and im starting to get tired of muting it over and over again. Rito help a bratha out{{champion:58}} {{champion:75}}

replies.body:
Since the new client is still in testing there are going to be a few instances, such as the client unmuting, that you'll run into when the client is patched. 

Be sure to use the bug report button on the client so the client devs can be more aware of this volume level reset. Also posting this in the [Client Discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) section will help out a lot! ;)

Thanks for testing!
